---
id: verify-user-account
title: "Verify user account"
description: "The API is used to verify a user account. It checks the user's account is valid and active within the sysytem. Authentication via an access token is required."
sidebar_label: "Verify user account"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/seerportal-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Verify user account"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/userDetails/verify-account"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API is used to verify a user account. It checks the user's account is valid and active within the sysytem. Authentication via an access token is required.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
